name: video-to-audio-extractor
title: Video to Audio Extractor
description: Extract audio track from video files in various formats
content:
Overview

This application extracts the audio track from video files and saves it in various audio formats. Built using MoviePy, it supports multiple audio formats including MP3, WAV, AAC, and FLAC with customizable bitrate settings.

Features

  • Extract audio from any video file with audio track
  • Support for MP3, WAV, AAC, and FLAC formats
  • Customizable bitrate for lossy formats
  • Preserves original audio quality
  • Automatic audio track detection

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Output Format: Select audio format (MP3, WAV, AAC, FLAC)
  • Bitrate: Audio bitrate for lossy formats (default: 192k)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates an audio file with the same base name as the video but with the selected audio format extension (e.g., video.mp3).

Format Details

  • MP3: Compressed, widely compatible, good for general use
  • WAV: Uncompressed, lossless, large file size
  • AAC: Compressed, better quality than MP3 at same bitrate
  • FLAC: Compressed but lossless, smaller than WAV

Use Cases

  • Extracting music or dialogue from videos
  • Creating audio podcasts from video recordings
  • Archiving audio content separately
  • Audio analysis and processing
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$(date +%s%N)"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; [ ! -d "$REPO_DIR" ] && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/video_to_audio_extractor.py" "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -f "${format}" -b "${bitrate}"
